name: Keep Distance (Antelope Games)
description:
The game is about the current situation where everyone needs to follow certain rules to ensure their and their families health, in which one of the rule is to keep distance while we go out. So with this in mind we made a Human Chess kinda game where the player has to take turn and move one step at a time, keeping in mind that he should not cross paths or be on the block where the other characters might land on, or else the player looses the level. 

With this basic idea we have made a short game of about 15 levels to play and enjoy your free time.

Thanking You

- By Antelope Games.

Team Members:

Nishant - Artist

Shubham - Artist

Yash Patil - Level Designer

Ujjwal Kumar - Game Developer/Game Designer

Hrushikesh Bhat - Game Developer/Team Lead
